name: ToastArrow
description:
Displays an element positioned against the toast anchor.
Renders a `<div>` element.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
render.detailedType:
| ReactElement
| ((
    props: HTMLProps,
    state: Toast.Arrow.State,
  ) => ReactElement)

data-uncentered.description: Present when the toast arrow is uncentered.

data-align.description: Indicates how the toast is aligned relative to specified side.

data-side.description: Indicates which side the toast is positioned relative to the anchor.
